column4: question, trying to setup secondary nic attached to a switch I have no control over using private IP to connect to another server attached to the same switch with another private IP...not getting ping response.
so you have two nics on the same switch?
okay so two server each with a nic on the same switch and what is the problem?
not getting a ping response, server1 IP 192.168.1.19, server2 IP 192.168.1.30...routes are setup according to the nic's usign those IP's
not getting a ping response, server1 IP 192.168.1.19, server2 IP 192.168.1.30...routes are setup according to the nic's usign those IP's
done on the command line as this will be temporary....want the ifconfig -a?
does one of the servers has more nics
these nics have never been used before
aha, but each server has only one active, the one connected to the switch?
no the eth0 on both hosts are active and have different IP's and are connected to a different switch which I have no access too
